tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Soil_Moisture_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  moisture_level FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Plant_Growth_Data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  growth_rate FLOAT,
  health_status VARCHAR(50),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Systems (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  status VARCHAR(50),
  water_flow_rate FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Soil_Moisture_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  soil_type VARCHAR(50),
  moisture_level DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Plant_Growth_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
  growth_rate DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Irrigation_Systems (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  system_type VARCHAR(50),
  efficiency DECIMAL,
  last_maintenance DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Correlation_Data (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  plant_id INT,
  correlation_coefficient DECIMAL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE soil_moisture_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  location VARCHAR,
  moisture_level DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE plant_growth_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  growth_rate DECIMAL,
  growth_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_system (
  system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_type VARCHAR,
  flow_rate DECIMAL,
  status VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_log (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  water_used DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE irrigation_schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  system_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)
